The time of contact is greater with the soft surface than the hard surface. The ball bounces off the soft surface at an angle of <math alttext="30 degrees" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>30</mn><mo>°</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and with speed <math alttext="v sub 2 is less than v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mi>v</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. choices.label: The figure shows an arrow pointing to the right that is the same size as the original arrow.
The figure shows an arrow pointing to the right that is half the size as the original arrow.
